data.name: Daniel Oyama
data.Profile: I consider myself a lifelong learner and I am looking forward to being part of a team that is developing cutting-edge technologies. Disciplines of study and interest: machine learning, big data, IoT, cloud services, business models and startups. I enjoy making decisions, facing challenges that involve professional growth and a positive impact on the company.

certificate.name: Carrera de big data y data science

experience.jobDescription: started the restaurant in the city of Toluca, concept of Mexican snacks. Rating 4.3 google maps and uber eats. In charge of all the administrative, marketing, finance and some operative areas of the restaurant. Payroll of 8 people. Business transfer due to change of personal objectives and lack of growth.

Assigned as Facilities Manager of the Philips Mexicana’s building. In charge of security personnel, receptionists, drivers, cleaners, technicians and maintenance providers. Staffed by 40 people. Monthly Budget $400 000 MN. Savings of 10% per year were achieved.

Technical reviewer for the hiring of 80 technicians. Creation of predictive, preventive and corrective maintenance plans, approximately 80. Creation of bill of materials and list of critical equipment for the maintenance module for SAP. In charge of make the weekly compliance report of scheduled maintenance.

Review inventories (Days/weeks on hand, stock to sales ratio, backorder rate, average inventory, stock-outs, etc) of more than 300 point of sales establishments (Walmart, Soriana, Comercial Mexicana) In charge of make the daily sales report of all the products of the company. Assigned to planning the logistic of the relocation in Zacatecas’plant to the industrial park El Marques in Queretaro
